CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "DOWN SWING LANE - With the fall theatrical season about to go into full swing, these artists are keeping things hot all over the country... Marva Louis is one of the mainstays of 'Atlantic City Follies, ' soon to hit the road..."Marva Louis was married to boxer Joe Louis.
TitMainTitle: Full-length portrait of Marva Louis wearing dress with dark ruched detail on chest, long dark gloves, and dark fabric in hair, posed in front of sheet hung from wall
